funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the Instituto Nacional de Ciencia e Tecnologia (INCT) em Dengue (CNPq/FAPEMIG 573876/2008-08; http://labs.icb.ufmg.br/inctemdengue), FAPEMIG and CNPq. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
